vrpRep.structure.instance

Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • vrpRep.structure.instance.Vehicle

  • public class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all inforation and attributes of a vehicle.
    Author:
    Maxim HOSKINS, Romain LIENARD, Raphael MOLY and Alexandre RENAUD

      • getAttribute

        public java.util.List<VrpAtt> getAttribute(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves an attribute from list of attributes.
        By default, the following attribute names are provide :
        • type : id of type of vehicle. Stored in IntValue
        • fixedCost : fixed cost of vehicle. Stored in DoubleValue
        • variableCost : fixed cost of vehicle. Stored in DoubleValue
        • number : Number of available vehicles. Stored in IntValue
        • nodeTypesCompatible : list of compatible nodes. Stored in IntValue
        • speedProfile : allowed speed of vehicle. Stored in DoubleValue for global average or in SpeedInt for a series of speed intervals
        • maxTravelDistance : maximum travel distance. Stored in DoubleValue
        • maxTravelDistanceIsFlexible : true if maximum travel distance is flexible false otherwise. Stored in BooleanValue
        • maxRequests : maximum number of requests. Stored in IntValue
        • maxRequestsIsFlexible : true if number of requests is flexible false otherwise. Stored in BooleanValue
        • wLPMaxWorkTime : maximum work time. Stored in DoubleValue
        • wLPMaxWorkTimeIsFlexible : true if maximum work time is flexible false otherwise. Stored in BooleanValue
        • wLPtw : time windows of possible work periods. Stored in TimeWindow
        • capacity: total capacity of vehicle. Stored in DoubleValue
        • compartment : capacities of compartments. Stored in Compartment
        • departureNode : id of departure node. Stored in IntValue
        • arrivalNode : id of arrival node. Stored in IntValue
        • skill : list of skills. Stored in SkillAndTool
        • tool: list of tools. Stored in SkillAndTool
        Parameters:
        name - name of attribute
        Returns:
        attribute. null if not found

      • getAtts

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<VrpAtt>> getAtts()
        Returns:
        list of attributes
